post_warned.subject: {warner_display_name} warned you with {strikes, plural, one {# strike} other {# strikes}} in {discussion_title}

user_warned.subject: {warner_display_name} warned you with {strikes, plural, one {# strike} other {# strikes}}

notifications.warning_text: {strikes, plural, one {You were warned with # strike by {mod_username}} other {You were warned with # strikes by {mod_username}}}

post.warning: {strikes, plural, one {Warned with # strike by {mod_username}} other {Warned with # strikes by {mod_username}}}

validation.public_comment_required: You most provide a public comment.
validation.invalid_strike_count: The number of strikes must be an integer between 0 and 5.

warning_list.no_warnings: It looks like there are no warnings here.
warning_list.warnings: {strikes, plural, one {Moderator Warnings: # Strike Received} other {Moderator Warnings: # Strikes Received}}

warning_modal.confirmation_message: Your warning has been saved. You may need to refresh the page to see it.
warning_modal.heading: Warn {username}
warning_modal.strikes_heading: How many strikes should be applied?
warning_modal.public_comment_heading: Why is {username} receiving these warnings? These comments will be visible to the user and other moderators.
warning_modal.private_comment_heading: Why is {username} receiving these warnings? These comments will ONLY be visible to other moderators.
